name: Sigurd M端ller
background: Born into a family of brewers, Sigurd M端ller took over The Dragon's Hearth after his father's passing. Known for his strict adherence to tavern rules and fair pricing, he has turned the establishment into a respected gathering place for locals and travelers alike.

name: Olaf Jones
background: Olaf Jones started working at The Moonlit Chalice as a dishwasher, but his quick wit and friendly demeanor earned him a promotion to barmaid. He dreams of one day owning his own tavern and is saving every copper piece towards that goal.

name: Uhtred MacLean
background: Uhtred MacLean left his family's farm to seek a more exciting life in the city. Working at The Golden Scales, he enjoys the freedom of city life and the opportunity to meet new people every day.

name: Katherine MacIntyre
background: Katherine MacIntyre has spent decades studying herbs and remedies at The Herbalist's Den. Her precise measurements and careful documentation have made her one of the most respected alchemists in Duskvale, known for her reliable cures and tonics.

name: Otto Hansen
background: Otto Hansen has served as an administrator at The Ivory Keep for over twenty years. His meticulous record-keeping and strict adherence to protocol have earned him the respect of both nobles and staff.

name: Aldwin M端ller
background: Aldwin M端ller has spent his life perfecting his craft at The Golden Scales. His furniture and woodwork are known throughout Duskvale for their durability and elegant simplicity.

name: Matilda Durand
background: Matilda Durand joined the city guard at The Guard Barracks when she was just 18. Now, after nearly 50 years of service, she is one of the most experienced and respected guards in Duskvale, known for her fair but firm approach to maintaining order.

name: Fiona Wilson
background: Fiona Wilson has dedicated her life to studying religious texts at The Black Cathedral. Her scholarly work on ancient religious practices has helped preserve important aspects of the city's spiritual heritage.

name: Katherine Karlsen
background: Katherine Karlsen has worked at The Velvet Veil for decades, using her experience to help younger courtesans navigate the challenges of their profession. She maintains a professional distance while offering practical advice to those who seek it.

name: Katherine Larsen
background: Katherine Larsen took over The Iron Heart after her father's death, becoming one of the few female blacksmiths in Duskvale. Her work is known for its traditional techniques and reliable quality.

name: Gerhard Becker
background: Gerhard Becker works long hours at The Drunken Sailor to support his large family. His skill with spices and ability to stretch ingredients has made him invaluable to the tavern's kitchen, where he's known for turning simple ingredients into satisfying meals.

name: Beatrice Wilson
background: Beatrice Wilson is the youngest guard at The Guard Barracks, following in her mother's footsteps. Despite her youth, she takes her duties seriously and is determined to prove herself worthy of the guard's uniform.

name: Jerome Schulz
background: Jerome Schulz grew up listening to tales of distant lands and daring exploits. Now a young adventurer, he spends his days exploring the city's hidden corners and documenting its lesser-known stories, hoping to one day venture beyond Duskvale's walls.

name: Bartholomew MacKay
background: Bartholomew MacKay lives a simple life, content with his modest means. Having worked various jobs throughout his life, he now enjoys his retirement, spending his days observing the city's daily rhythms and sharing stories with anyone who will listen.

name: Norman Moreau
background: Norman Moreau serves at The Black Cathedral, where he provides spiritual guidance to the city's residents. Known for his patient listening and thoughtful advice, he helps people navigate life's challenges while maintaining the cathedral's traditions.

name: Connor Hoffmann
background: Connor Hoffmann has spent years traveling between religious sites, documenting his experiences and collecting stories of faith. His time in Duskvale has given him a new appreciation for the city's unique spiritual heritage.

name: Fergus Johansen
background: Fergus Johansen oversees The Ivory Keep with a careful balance of tradition and progress. His decisions are guided by centuries of family history, but he's not afraid to implement changes that benefit the city's future.

name: Eleanor Robert
background: Eleanor Robert has maintained The Steam Haven for decades, ensuring the bathhouse remains a place of comfort and cleanliness. Her knowledge of the building's ancient plumbing systems is unmatched, and she takes pride in keeping this important public space running smoothly.

name: Catriona Bernard
background: Catriona Bernard is one of the youngest priests at The Black Cathedral, bringing fresh perspectives to ancient traditions. Her sermons often focus on practical applications of faith in daily life, making religious teachings accessible to the common folk.

name: Niamh Olsen
background: Niamh Olsen joined The Guard Barracks after witnessing the positive impact guards had on her neighborhood. Her calm demeanor and quick thinking have made her particularly effective at de-escalating conflicts before they turn violent.

name: Jacqueline Olsen
background: Jacqueline Olsen apprenticed at The Steel Anvil, where she developed a unique style of combining traditional blacksmithing techniques with modern designs. Her work is particularly popular among the city's younger nobility, who appreciate her innovative approach to classic pieces.

name: Owen MacKay
background: Owen MacKay's attention to detail and precise measurements have made him one of the most sought-after tailors in the city. His clients appreciate his ability to create garments that are both comfortable and perfectly fitted, regardless of the wearer's shape or size.

name: Denis Andersen
background: Denis Andersen works at the Trade Warehouses, where his physical strength and reliability have earned him the respect of his fellow workers. He takes pride in his ability to handle even the heaviest cargo with care and efficiency.

name: Catriona MacLeod
background: Catriona MacLeod is a master blacksmith at The Steel Anvil, specializing in creating intricate metalwork for the city's most prestigious buildings. Her decorative ironwork can be seen throughout Duskvale, from cathedral gates to noble estates.

name: Patricia Williams
background: Patricia Williams has spent her life in quiet contemplation at The Black Cathedral. Her daily routine of prayer and meditation has given her a deep understanding of spiritual matters, and she often serves as a guide for those seeking inner peace.

name: Ida Hoffmann
background: Ida Hoffmann is the youngest blacksmith at Shining Steel, where she's quickly gaining a reputation for her skill with delicate metalwork. Her enthusiasm for learning new techniques and her willingness to experiment have made her a rising star in the city's blacksmithing community.

name: Nicole MacPherson
background: Nicole MacPherson oversees The Ivory Keep with a focus on maintaining peaceful relations between the city's various factions. Her ability to find common ground and negotiate compromises has made her an effective leader in times of tension.

name: Lawrence MacKay
background: Lawrence MacKay has worked at The Velvet Veil for years, providing companionship and conversation to the city's elite. His ability to make others feel at ease and his knowledge of current events make him a popular choice among the establishment's clientele.

name: Eleanor MacIntyre
background: Eleanor MacIntyre maintains the financial records at The Quill & Scroll, where her meticulous attention to detail has helped the bookstore thrive. Her system of organization is so efficient that other businesses often seek her advice on managing their own accounts.

name: Roland Schmidt
background: Roland Schmidt takes great pride in maintaining the cleanliness and order of The Steam Haven. His knowledge of proper hygiene practices and his friendly demeanor have made him a favorite among the bathhouse's regular patrons.

name: Marie Bernard
background: Marie Bernard has spent years traveling between sacred sites, collecting stories of faith and miracles. Her time in Duskvale has given her a deep appreciation for the city's unique blend of religious traditions and everyday spirituality.

name: Brigid Pedersen
background: Brigid Pedersen chose to work at The Velvet Veil as a means of securing her financial independence. Her sharp wit and knowledge of current events make her a popular companion among the city's intellectuals and artists.

name: Robert MacKay
background: Robert MacKay runs The Quill & Scroll with a passion for making knowledge accessible to all. He takes pride in helping customers find the perfect book, whether they're scholars seeking rare texts or children looking for their first storybook.

name: Constance Wilson
background: Constance Wilson has a natural affinity for horses, able to calm even the most skittish of animals. Her gentle approach and deep understanding of equine behavior have made her one of the most trusted stable hands in the city.

name: Francis Fischer
background: Francis Fischer's attention to detail and innovative approach to traditional tailoring techniques have earned him a growing reputation. His ability to create garments that are both fashionable and functional has attracted a diverse clientele.

name: Astrid Wagner
background: Astrid Wagner's research at The Black Cathedral focuses on the intersection of religious practices and daily life. Her work has helped bridge the gap between formal religious teachings and their practical applications in the community.

name: Sophia MacIntyre
background: Sophia MacIntyre's journey as a pilgrim has taken her to many sacred sites, but she finds Duskvale particularly fascinating for its unique blend of spiritual traditions. She documents her observations in detailed journals, hoping to preserve these insights for future generations.

name: Rochelle Schulz
background: Rochelle Schulz's decades of service at The Guard Barracks have given her a deep understanding of the city's rhythms and patterns. She mentors younger guards, teaching them not just the rules but the wisdom that comes from years of maintaining order.

name: Fulke MacLean
background: Fulke MacLean serves at The Black Cathedral with a focus on helping the city's youth. His approachable nature and ability to explain complex spiritual concepts in simple terms have made him particularly effective at connecting with younger members of the congregation.

name: Connor MacKenzie
background: Connor MacKenzie's long career as an adventurer has given him countless tales to share. Now in his later years, he spends his time documenting his experiences and mentoring young adventurers, teaching them the importance of both courage and caution.

name: Una Davis
background: Una Davis has spent decades streamlining administrative processes at The Shadow Cloister. Her innovative filing system and methodical approach to record-keeping have become the standard for religious institutions throughout the city.

name: Wilhelmina Wilson
background: Wilhelmina Wilson has worked various jobs at The Shadow Cloister for most of her life. Her knowledge of the building's maintenance needs and her willingness to help others have made her an indispensable part of the cloister's daily operations.

name: Gwendolen Wagner

name: Alain Schmidt
